document_name: Law No. 12,307 creating the Bicameral Commission for the attention and monitoring of natural disasters
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/ARG/1999/ARG-1999-12-25-Law No. 12,307 creating the Bicameral Commission for the attention and monitoring of natural disasters_3b474f644f9ca030b8a26d748e0c4576.pdf
document_description: This law creates the Bicameral Commission for the Attention and Monitoring of Natural Disasters caused by Water and/or Climatic Emergencies to propose a regulatory system for water and climate emergencies.
